name: strava-enhancer
description: A plugin to add some enhancements to Strava.com.
author: Luke Karrys <luke@lukekarrys.com>

scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run validate && npm run lint
scripts.publish-patch: npm run preversion && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm run preversion && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm run preversion && npm version major && npm publish
